_description: Fragment of a carol, perhaps on the Annunciation, with notation, and with a refrain beginning, ‘ffarewell lo…’, on a binding fragment

CULAdd2764.Note: This fragment formerly loose at f. 219 of Cambridge UK,  Cambridge University Library Ii.5.18.

Greene,  Richard Leighton.

            also Greene (1935)

             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
